metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32821 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: MooTools is a collection of JavaScript utilities for JavaScript developers. All known versions include a CSS selector parser that is vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS). An attack requires that an attacker can inject a string into a CSS selector at runtime, which is quite common with e.g. jQuery CSS selectors. No patches are available for this issue.

criterions.comment: mootools package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
